page.title: 08BOWS YOUTH ORGANISATIONS
page.content: {1st BOW CUB SCOUTS}meet on Mondays in the cub scouts room attached to the Village Hall.{THE YOUTH CLUB}meet on Friday in the Village Hall. They have facilities for snooker and table tennis and partake in many outdoor sports and activities.{SPORT CLUBS } includes badminton ,snooker,football, and netball.{THE GIRL GUIDES }were active until this year but were forced to close as no new leader could be found.There are two{SUNDAY SCHOOLS} attached to the Church of England and the Plymouth Brethren.{THE CHURCH }has a choir which is affiliated to the Royal School of Church Music. They sing for services twice a month and for weddings. They attend two festivals in Exeter Cathedral each year.{THE PLAYGROUP}meet on Wednesday and Thursday mornings in the Village Hall.
